China's Country Garden says over 30 projects have local government supportCash-strapped developer Country Garden said on Saturday more than 30 of its projects had been listed by Chinese local governments as suitable for financing support, as authorities aim to inject liquidity into the crisis-hit sector. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 14:39:38 GMT PAR2NTG36FJGNCJN4M2HCTSVYY https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-country-garden-says-over-30-projects-have-local-government-support-2024-02-03/Reuters世界中国
India to replace troops in Maldives with civilians by MayIndia will remove its troops in the Maldives by May, the Maldivian Foreign Ministry said on Saturday, as the two countries seek agreement on a pullout that has strained ties. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 11:40:01 GMT ONKQWJCEP5MKTC4OVTZLHLKVCY https://www.reuters.com/world/india-replace-troops-maldives-with-civilians-by-may-2024-02-03/Krishn Kaushik, Mohamed Junayd世界
China chip maker YMTC says its tech not for military use after Pentagon listChina's top memory chip maker YMTC said on Saturday its technology is not for military use after it was added to a Pentagon list of entities assisting China's military. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 08:10:50 GMT ADHGJYHK4ZLGZBPFPRJCY5VO5Q https://www.reuters.com/technology/china-chip-maker-ymtc-says-its-tech-not-military-use-after-pentagon-list-2024-02-03/Reuters技术
China launches Jielong-3 rocket as commercial missions pick up paceA small but powerful Chinese rocket capable of carrying payloads at competitive costs delivered nine satellites into orbit on Saturday, Chinese state media reported, in what is gearing up to be another busy year for Chinese commercial launches. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 07:21:12 GMT 777HPQGV7ZMBPPDIXIKZBVX5DA https://www.reuters.com/technology/space/china-launches-powerful-jielong-3-rocket-paves-way-more-commercial-missions-2024-02-03/Ryan Woo技术空间
How North Korean eyelashes make their way to West as 'made in China'The eyelashes give North Korea a way to skirt sanctions, providing vital foreign currency. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 07:02:52 GMT 5CBUHRCFONOR5LJWBAJHA455CY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/how-north-korean-eyelashes-make-their-way-west-made-china-2024-02-03/Ju-Min Park, Eduardo Baptista世界亚太地区
China says Philippine vessel "illegally" landed on disputed atollChina said on Saturday a small civilian vessel from the Philippines had "illegally placed itself on the beach" of an atoll in the South China Sea that both countries claim. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 06:29:24 GMT TALNEI7CLFMAFHVZ34WFLCZ6EI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-says-philippine-vessel-illegally-landed-disputed-atoll-2024-02-03/Reuters世界亚太地区
